item.title: Ukrainian city hit by 'massive' strike as peace talks in US conclude
item.description: Russia carried out strikes on Kremenchuk, while its defence ministry said it had shot down 77 Ukrainian drones in several locations.

item.title: Japan is facing a dementia crisis – can technology help?
item.description: Japan's ageing population is putting strain on national budgets and society as a whole, but researchers are developing solutions to ease the pressure.

item.title: A new museum in Doha celebrates Indian art legend MF Husain
item.description: Lawh Wa Qalam is dedicated to the late Indian artist whose prolific paintings fascinated the world.

item.title: Death toll from devastating Indonesia floods passes 900
item.description: More than 100,000 homes were destroyed when powerful rains lashed the South East Asian country last week.

item.title: Staff and tourists among 25 killed in Goa nightclub fire
item.description: Officials believe a gas canister explosion triggered the fire which tore through the busy nightlife venue.

item.title: The Papers: Starmer to 'fight on' and 'Dad's plea to Meghan'
item.description: A mix of stories leads Sunday front pages.

item.title: Staff and tourists among 23 killed in Goa nightclub fire, officials say
item.description: The fire was caused by a gas cylinder exploding in the club's kitchen, authorities say, with the nationalities of those killed not yet known.

item.title: How the solar storms that cause the Northern Lights can wreak havoc on Earth
item.description: The aurora borealis can bring stunning night skies, but hidden dangers can accompany the Northern Lights to disrupt life on earth as Chris Fawkes explains.

item.title: Hong Kong to vote in election as city mourns deadly fire
item.description: The Legislative Council election is seen as a test of public sentiment following a deadly fire that angered some.

item.title: Sold 30 items on Vinted? Don't panic if you get a message about tax
item.description: Here's what you need to know about tax rules if you're selling items online.

item.title: Wham-ageddon: Can a new song really become Christmas number one?
item.description: This Christmas, to save you from tears, there’s some genuine competition, our music correspondent finds.

item.title: Netflix deal puts Gary Lineker in podcast super league - but can he succeed?
item.description: In a big money move, Lineker will go head-to-head with his old employer with The Rest Is Football.

item.title: 'Ketamine Queen' spiralled before Matthew Perry death, friends tell BBC
item.description: A new BBC documentary sheds light on how Jasveen Sangha ended up being charged in the Matthew Perry case.

item.title: At least 23 people killed in Goa nightclub fire, official says
item.description: The fire was caused by a gas cylinder exploding in the club's kitchen, authorities say, with the nationalities of those killed not yet known.

item.title: Young people on benefits to be offered construction and hospitality work
item.description: The government says it will fund training and work experience for 350,000 not in work or education.
